recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A classic vegetarian Italian pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and olive oil. This pizza is known for its simplicity and the vibrant flavors of its fresh ingredients.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipes.description: A vegetarian pasta dish with garlic, olive oil, red pepper flakes, and parsley. Simple yet flavorful.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
recipes.description: A delightful Italian vegetarian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese. Tiramisu is a sweet and creamy treat that's perfect for the end of a meal.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender paneer (cottage cheese) in a tomato-based sauce with aromatic spices. Paneer Tikka Masala is a beloved Indian dish known for its flavorful and slightly spicy sauce.

recipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.description: Fragrant vegetarian rice dish with mixed vegetables and spices. Biryani is a classic Indian comfort food, combining the goodness of rice and veggies.

recipes.name: Mango Lassi
recipes.description: A refreshing vegetarian Indian drink made with yogurt and ripe mangoes. Mango Lassi is a perfect way to cool down on a hot day and enjoy the sweetness of mangoes.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Classic vegetarian salad with Romaine lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and Greek dressing. The freshness of the ingredients makes this salad delightful.

recipes.name: Garlic Bread
recipes.description: Crispy vegetarian bread with butter and garlic, perfect as a side or snack. Garlic bread is a tasty addition to any meal and pairs well with pasta or salads.

recipes.name: Coleslaw
recipes.description: Fresh and crunchy vegetarian salad with shredded cabbage and a creamy dressing. Coleslaw adds a refreshing crunch to your plate, making it an excellent side dish.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Homemade vegetarian cookies with chocolate chips, soft on the inside and crispy outside. These cookies are a delightful treat for chocolate lovers of all ages.

recipes.name: Cheesecake
recipes.description: Creamy and rich vegetarian dessert with a graham cracker crust and various toppings. Cheesecake is a classic dessert that can be customized with your favorite toppings.

recipes.name: Fruit Salad
recipes.description: Colorful vegetarian mix of fresh fruits served with a sweet syrup. Fruit salad is a healthy and refreshing way to enjoy a variety of fruits in one bowl.
